name: GameJam MiniLD: Qong
description:
Saddle your paddle and get ready to qong your buddy's balls right back at her face in this two player competitive pingy-pongy vs breakoutkanoid.

Made in 24 hours for Ludum Dare miniLD of March 2015

Default controls (you can change these from the window that opens when you launch the game):

Player 1 (left side):

W: Up

S: Down

Left shift: Launch ball

Player 2 (right side):

Up: Up

Down: Down

Right shift: Launch ball
